name: Forti
description:
Introduction

For those who like long days : start with Forti, then do the 105m Waterfall (20+45+40) of Pisson, walk up again to the start of Soffia, takes 15min and do Soffia integrale.

The approach to Forti is quite exposed,and long.

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape

Beta sites

  • Canyoning in the Alps Book by Simon Flower : Forti
  • Canyoning Nord Italia Book by Pascal van Duin : Val dei Forti + Pisson
  • Catastoforre AIC-Canyoning.it : Val dei Forti
